title: Cant comment. Stuck in level 6. Can't find 'contact support.' Riot's awesome.
body: Just put me at my actual level and stop trolling me riot, please.

replies.body:
Sometimes this Boards level just gets a little out of sync is all if they don't link up correctly. Posting here in H&S like you did, or using the Profile Syncing Tool which is stickied up top will get the job done pretty quickly. 

If you do ever need to reach out to support, the link for a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is right over on the left side as well ^_^!

Howdy theseapea,

You need to sync your boards profile to your LoL profile by [Clicking this Link](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)

Sincerely
-Bladenite
